All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminAccount
Represents an administrator account in the system.
AdminAccountRepository
Repository interface for AdminAccount data operations.
AdminLogin
Component responsible for handling the login process for administrators.
AdminLoginTest
 
AdminUI
Component that serves as the user interface for administrative actions within the application.
AdminUITest
 
ATM
The ATM class represents an ATM machine simulation in terms of user authentication.
ATMTest
 
CreateAccount
Service class that implements the administrative operation for creating new customer accounts.
CreateAccountTest
 
CustomerAccount
Represents a customer account in a financial or service-oriented system.
CustomerAccountRepository
Repository interface for CustomerAccount entities.
CustomerLogin
Component responsible for managing customer login processes.
CustomerLoginTest
 
CustomerUI
Component that serves as the user interface for customer actions within the application.
CustomerUITest
 
DeleteAccount
Service class that implements the administrative operation for deleting customer accounts.
DeleteAccountTest
 
DisplayAccountDetail
Marks this class as a Spring component, making it eligible for Spring's component scanning to detect and register it as a bean in the Spring application context.
DisplayAccountDetailTest
 
DisplayBalance
Service class that implements the customer operation for displaying account balances.
DisplayBalanceTest
 
IAdminOperate
Interface for defining administrative operations within the application.
ICustomerOperate
Interface for defining customer operations within the application.
ILogin
The ILogin interface defines a contract for user login mechanisms.
Main
Main application class that bootstraps a Spring Boot application.
MainTest
 
SearchAccount
Service class for searching customer accounts.
SearchAccountTest
 
UpdateAccount
Service class for updating customer account details.
UpdateAccountTest
 
UpdateDeposit
Service class that implements the operation for depositing cash into a customer's account.
UpdateDepositTest
 
Withdraw
Service class that implements the operation for withdrawing cash from a customer's account.
